channel.title: [DELTA] Vote4Cash not working
channel.description:
so i added the tutorial https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,434617.0.html and when i try to log into my server i get this error on server side command prompt [code]
Somescape -on- PORT 43594 - - - Now Online Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 53803. Client type: low memory version UserId: 99244913 ctk62 is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at MYSQL.checkVotes(MYSQL.java:46) at client.initialize(client.java:17278) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:236) at server.main(server.java:51) [/code]

item.title: [DELTA] Vote4Cash not working
item.dc:creator: @ctk62 ctk62
item.description:
@ctk62 wrote:

[code]
public static boolean checkVotes(String playerName)
{
try {
Statement statement = con.createStatement();
String query = “SELECT * FROM Votes WHERE username = '” + playerName + “’”;
ResultSet results = statement.executeQuery(query);
while(results.next()) {
int recieved = results.getInt(“recieved”);
if(recieved == 0)
{
return true;
}

                    }
            } catch(SQLException e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
            }
            return false;
    }[/code]
